Name: Soothsayer
Description: A healer, guiding voice, and all around pretty chill dude of the Melven race.

Attacks.Attack Description: Heals in a small area. With a few gentle words and a gesture, the soothsayer can bring relief to a group of Melves in need. If you've ever tried to fix an actual injury, you'd understand why it seems kind of cheap that they can just do that.
